name: Saints Row IV: How the Saints Save Christmas
name_original: Saints Row IV: How the Saints Save Christmas
description:
Saints Row IV: How the Saints Save Christmas is an action, shooter and racing game developed by Volition. It came out on 11-12-2013. Deep Silver published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Saints Row IV: How the Saints Save Christmas on PC and PlayStation 3.
